body.p: I have the honor to acknowledge the receipt of your Excellency's letter of the 6th inst. --
I had heretofore received the order directing the release of W. K. Long referred to in your note. Upon Examination he declined to take the oath required as a condition of his release. --
His Brother was here yesterday, and I enclose you copies of two letters written by him in reply to a letter from his brother urging him to take the oath --
I have the honor also to enclose the letter from Genl Canby to yourself, which accompanied Your Communication to me. --

I am, Governor,
Respectfully Yours &c
Wm W. Orme
Brig. Genl Commandg --

His Excellency
Thomas E. Bramlette
Govr. of Kentucky --
